Item.Description: Unique counter sword decorated with extravagant chains and spikes.

Item.Name: Code: Deleter
Item.Description: Ein Replika von no.6 Lockes Katana Deleter.{N} Durch die schmale Schwertscheide und den kurzen Griff werden zwar Abstriche in Sachen Sicherheit gemacht, dafür bist du mit diesem Katana umso schneller und tödlicher.

Item.Name: Virtual Shield
Item.Description: Net Shaman Luna's exclusive Counter Sword.{N}This unique weapon was developed during Luna's test phase.{N}With the ability to switch freely between offensive and defensive modes, it's an extremely effective and flexible weapon.{N}Winner of the EU Community Workshop contest: Krayds

Item.Name: T.O.D. Scythe
Item.Description: Bloody Hunter and Bloody Huntress's Unique EXO Scythe.{N}Its shape is reminiscent of dripping blood,{N}It is said to have a thirst for blood, but this appears to be merely apocryphal.{N}Its full name is the "Thanatos of Death" Scythe.

Item.Name: Binary Twin Blade
Item.Description: A weapon created when Glitch was born.{N}Nobody knows the true source of this black-and-white dual blade that annihilates data and tears through code.

Item.Name: Binary Sigma Blade
Item.Description: Glitch's White Twin Blade. {N}The seal was broken by the outbreak of Dead Pixel, and its true power was released.

Item.Name: Destruction Dagger
Item.Description: Destruction Glitch's unique spy dagger.{N}A shadowy variant of Glitch's Twin Blade. This weapon's devastating black blade is comprised of indecipherable, malicious code.

Item.Name: Vital Shock
Item.Description: This lethal melee weapon was sealed deep inside the Netsphere.{N}A prototype version was uncovered, and the Netsphere developer, Uz, was able to redesign and upgrade it with help of Mr. J and Mr. B.

Item.Name: Curious Cat Claw
Item.Description: Curiosity killed the cat, huh? Well, these claws are just as deadly!{N}If you're looking for a great new way to shred your foes to ribbons, look no further. These claws will earn you applause!

Item.Name: Vital Claw
Item.Description: A unique Leo Vital Shock.{N}Based on a stolen prototype of an unknown creator,{N}this Vital Shock is modeled after deadly feline claws.

Item.Name: Lucifer Blue
Item.Description: A bayonet symbolizing the arrogance of the corrupted ones. Though dark, it gives off a powerful energy.

Item.Name: Lucifer Green
Item.Description: A bayonet symbolizing the arrogance of the corrupted ones. Though dark, it gives off a powerful energy.

Item.Name: Crystal Plasma Sword
Item.Description: Unique Plasma Sword, the enhanced sword made out of hardened crystals.

Item.Name: Assassin Spy Dagger
Item.Description: Feel the force of the assassin hidden in the darkness! Assassin Spy Dagger!

Item.Name: Summernight Stormbat
Item.Description: A bat shaped like a firework, complete with burning wick.{N} Though it looks ready to blast off into the summer night, its wick is only for decoration.

Item.Name: Namahage Type-A
Item.Description: This upgraded version of the katana was stolen by Hacker G.{N}Originally, various versions of the katana were being developed in tandem with the Sigma Blade. However, research was halted due to the unexpected Hacker G attack. As a result, only a bare-bones, slashing katana was available... until now.

Item.Name: Namahage Type-B
Item.Description: This upgraded version of the katana was stolen by Hacker G.{N}Originally, various versions of the katana were being developed in tandem with the Sigma Blade. However, research was halted due to the unexpected Hacker G attack. As a result, only a bare-bones, slashing katana was available... until now.

Item.Name: Rux Plasma Sword
Item.Description: This plasma sword was customized to meet riders' demanding expectations. {N}A redesigned plasma dismantler was utilized to enhance stability and portability.

Item.Name: Sonic Shredder
Item.Description: Popular among up-and-coming rock stars, this hardcore guitar easily shreds enemies using acute sonic distortions.{N}Outside of battle, it transports its avid listeners to new and exciting soundscapes.

Item.Name: Icicle Counter Sword
Item.Description: This custom counter sword is modeled after a Christmas wreath.

Item.Name: Ice Edge
Item.Description: A deadly weapon that freezes the wounds of your enemies to inflict additional pain.

Item.Name: Wind Blades
Item.Description: These fan-shaped weapons are as beautiful as they are dangerous. Use with caution.

Item.Name: Rule Breaker
Item.Description: It's a special breaker to "fix" damaged code when their glitched nemesis needs a "forced reprogramming".{N}For those agents preferring to work undetected, this breaker is used for emergencies only.

Item.Name: Harpoon Plasma Sword
Item.Description: The oak tree wood makes it hard to break, {N} and the best part is that the fish was recently caught and is still fresh.

Item.Name: Tactical Knife
Item.Description: Tactical Knife is a multi-functional knife with a sharp blade that will inflict deadly damage on any enemy within range.

Item.Name: Arctic Surprise
Item.Description: An Arctic Surprise that commemorates Christmas.{N}I do not know what is in it, but it is certainly not a good gift.{N}Please note that you may get hurt when opening this gift.

Item.Name: Golden Tactical Knife
Item.Description: Gold edition of the Tactical Knife. Its most stunning feature is the bling-bling gold covered exterior.

Item.Name: Galaxy Counter Sword
Item.Description: An airplane-shaped shield made of 8-bit pixels with a rainbow glow. The Galaxy Counter Sword can defeat the enemy's attack with the energy of the Galaxy!

Item.Name: Training Submachine Gun
Item.Description: Suitable weapon for medium distance attacks with rapid fire rate and average accuracy.

Item.Name: Submachine Gun
Item.Description: Suitable weapon for medium distance attacks with rapid fire rate and average accuracy.

Item.Name: Revolver
Item.Description: This weapon has massive power in close range.{N}It is perfect for attacks against close range opponents{N}because it has a knock back effect. But it is inefficient{N}against long range opponents because of low accuracy.

Item.Name: Semi-Rifle
Item.Description: It has a lower fire rate than the Submachine Gun but makes up for this with a much higher accuracy while zoomed in half-way.

Item.Name: Smash Rifle
Item.Description: Supports lots of ammo and close range attacks. Efficient for medium range attacks due to lots of ammo and powerful impact. Also can melee attack close enemies.

Item.Name: Hand Gun
Item.Description: An easy to use shooting weapon with fast attack speed. When equipped, the character's movement would become faster and quicker.

Item.Name: Burst Shotgun
Item.Description: Weapon effective in close range. You can shoot serveral bullets at one time and push opponents and face close range weapons easily.

Item.Name: DHa-41
Item.Description: Blue fish Sub Machine Gun{N}containing plenty of DHA and Omega 3{N}(We cannot guarantee nutrition.)

Item.Name: Puppy Revolver
Item.Description: Faked cute look.{N}Puppy revolver with strong fire power.

Item.Name: AYA! Rifle
Item.Description: You will be seized with fear by just looking at it, and you will get severe pain when you are shot. Ouch!! !

Item.Name: Laser Cat
Item.Description: Put together two things everybody likes. Cat and Laser!! Who will be the winner of Laser Cat!

Item.Name: Classic Burst Shotgun
Item.Description: The Classic Burst Shotgun gives you the feeling of an medieval shotgun.

Item.Name: Toy Gun
Item.Description: Hand Gun with a toy gun concept used during childhood.

Item.Name: Homing Rifle
Item.Description: Helps to aim, but it is less accurate at long-distance attacks.

Item.Name: Air Gun
Item.Description: This gun works by compressed air, turned into explosions. The energy needs to be chared before the blast. Movement speed is reduced during the charge.

Item.Name: Shark Submachine Gun
Item.Description: Next Generation Sub Machine Gun. Bites their prey badly with sharp teeth.

Item.Name: Spark Rifle
Item.Description: Helps to aim, but it is less accurate at long-distance attacks and rapid shooting. Randomly fires a critical shot.

Item.Name: Diamond Air Gun
Item.Description: Strong like a diamond, the unique version of the Air Gun.

Item.Name: Silverhunter Homing Rifle
Item.Description: Exocister's main weapon for killing devils. It is recommened to novices. Easy to aim.

Item.Name: shootingstar Spark Rifle
Item.Description: Helps to aim, but it is less accurate at long-distance attacks and rapid shooting. Randomly fires a critical shot.

Item.Name: Assault Rifle
Item.Description: Fast and Furious to attack the enemy. It has high attack, but low accurate as increased the attack time.

Item.Name: Training Homing Rifle
Item.Description: Helps to aim, but it is less accurate at long-distance attacks.

Item.Name: Piranha Assault Rifle
Item.Description: Fast and furious Piranha attack! Bullet focus is decreasing during longer attacks.

Item.Name: Skull Handgun
Item.Description: Skull Handgun with a scary skull design

Item.Name: Dual Magnum
Item.Description: Specially designed dual handguns for the Netsphere. With this weapon, you fight as stylish as in Eastern action flics. {N}By using some of your SP, you can attack your opponent while being in the air or when dodging!

Item.Name: Viola Semi-Rifle
Item.Description: Semi-rifle with Sweet melody, fast as thunder

Item.Name: Cogwheel assault Rifle
Item.Description: Rifle strong as thunder

Item.Name: Knight Smash Rifle
Item.Description: Enhanced Smash Rifle with NetSphere's AI data

Item.Name: Luteous Revolver
Item.Description: The vibrant orange color of this revolver radiates power

Item.Name: Neo Spade Submachine Gun
Item.Description: Spade shaped Submachine Gun which becomes more powerful in Wonderland

Item.Name: Bubble Homing Rifle
Item.Description: Fight the heat! Cool down yourself and others with this nice water gun. Homing Rifle Unique Watergun

Item.Name: Golden Gear Smash Rifle
Item.Description: A Smash Rifle that has been originally used by an adventurer in S4. The reflected light from the Smash Rifle helps the adventurers when they explore in the darkness.

Item.Name: Puppy Revolver (Returner)
Item.Description: Faked cute look.{N}Puppy revolver with strong fire power.

Item.Name: Shark Submachine Guns (Returner)
Item.Description: Next Generation Sub Machine Gun. Bites their prey badly with sharp teeth.

Item.Name: SnowDrop Dual Magnum
Item.Description: This gun was created by the legendary Hacker G, but never released. Until now. {N}{CB-255,0,0,255} The Collecting Book effect can be acquired once the Burning Winter Boy/Sexy Winter Girl set is acquired. {N} Buff Effect: No SP guage will be reduced during use of jumping actions.

Item.Name: Cherry Blossom Submachine Gun
Item.Description: A submachine gun with a cherry blossom pattern. It looks like cherry blossoms might just shoot out of the barrel!

Item.Name: Cherry Blossom Puppy Revolver
Item.Description: A revolver modeled after a puppy at a cherry blossom festival. Don't be fooled by its cute design. It's much more wicked than it looks!

Item.Name: Burst Shotgun MK2
Item.Description: A new burst Shotgun with some powerful upgrades over the previous model. It sports a larger clip with increased Accuracy while firing. Its look has been completely redesigned.

Item.Name: Angora Laser
Item.Description: Don't let its fluffy face and sweet demeanor fool you. This little critter packs a scorching laser blast!!

Item.Name: Cheese Laser
Item.Description: You might be tempted to take a nibble, but beware! This tasty snack packs a scorching laser blast!!

Item.Name: Neden Typewriter
Item.Description: This mafia-style assault rifle is famous among Neden-based leaguers.{N}Upgraded based on data leaked from Dominic's secret project, this weapon is part of the effort to introduce real-world weapons to the Net Sphere for battle simulation.

Item.Name: L'umanità E L'onore
Item.Description: Unique dual magnum combo popular among gangsters in Neden.{N}Available in various colors but the unwritten rule is one should always use two magnums in different colors.{N}The gun in the left hand is called L'umanità, and its partner in your right hand is L'onore.

Item.Name: Envy Spark
Item.Description: The Envy Ranger version of the Spark Rifle.{N}The primary weapon of the Envy Rangers,{N}its bursting bullets are the bane of lovebirds everywhere.

Item.Name: Envy Breath
Item.Description: The Envy Ranger version of the Air Gun.{N}A deadly weapon of the Envy Rangers,{N}its blast is enough to send lovebirds scattering.

Item.Name: The Big Blue Revolver
Item.Description: Are you ready for summer? Then head on down to the beach for some fun in the sun!{N}Don't forget to bring this 2016 version of the Unique Revolver along for the ride! What are you waiting for?!{N}Have a blast this summer with Davy and Nautica!

Item.Name: Barbas & Marbas
Item.Description: This powerful demonic weapon pulls its user deeper into damnation each time it is used.

Item.Name: Tactical AR
Item.Description: Modified version of an assault rifle well-known for its excellent safety. It's been designed to work in its full potential in any type of environment.{N}[Used in Marksmanship Training at Netsphere Highschool]

Item.Name: UMG-11
Item.Description: UMG-11 is a submachine gun for raining that's popular amongst military types. Fast firing speed is its advantage against enemies with low HP.

Item.Name: Golden UMG-11
Item.Description: Gold edition of the UMG-11. Its most stunning feature is the bling-bling gold covered exterior.

Item.Name: Heavy Machine Gun
Item.Description: Gatling gun which can attack several enemies. It is useful to guard team players, with a large magazine and wide attack range. But it is difficult to manage in a desperate situation because it has a warm-up time unlike other weapons.

Item.Name: Gauss Rifle
Item.Description: Single and automatic burst rifle. The longer you fire the more the accuracy drops. To keep a high accuracy, carefully balance the length of your bursts.

Item.Name: Dracula Rifle
Item.Description: Dracula's Electronic guitar frightens you with a melody of blood-red temptation.

Item.Name: Metal Storm
Item.Description: The battleground gets heated up in red by countless bullets.

Item.Name: Turret
Item.Description: Multiple targeting Gatling Gun. You can install this weapon for more power attack.

Item.Name: Shadow Turret
Item.Description: Vanish into the shadow. Install this weapon into the ground to have a more powerful weapon.

Item.Name: Light Machine Gun
Item.Description: This heavy weapon has been specially designed with this unknown technology{N}and amazingly its weight has been reduced.{N} Firing speed is much faster than the speed of light.{N}It is always aiming for middle of its target.

Item.Name: Umbrella Light Machine Gun
Item.Description: This unique machinegun was secretly imported to China by the group of hackers. It was orginally designed to assasinate agents.

Item.Name: Turret MK2
Item.Description: S4 League is now back with new type of MK2 weapon - Turret MK2 with better defense rate. A player with Turret MK2 will rule the game.

Item.Name: Rocket Launcher
Item.Description: Newly invented weapon by enigmatic hacker group, Mad 'M', of S4 League. Can use for rapid fires and a big strong shot. Also, has various special functions according to the style of Mad 'M'.

Item.Name: Rocket Launcher by Mad 'M'
Item.Description: A Rocket Launcher upgraded by Mad 'M'. It's bigger and comes with more firepower. It uses a two-step compression, allowing for actioned-packed control. It also has lots of special functions, just the way Mad 'M' likes it.

Item.Name: Light Machine Gun MK2
Item.Description: Spew out bullets in a V for victory! Use the Light Machine Gun with its two additional muzzles to spray bullets continuously. Deals weak damage over a large area, but critical accuracy will drop dramatically.

Item.Name: Gauss Rifle MK2
Item.Description: Newly created Gauss Rifle MK2. Occupy Net Sphere with upgraded Gauss Rifle MK2.

Item.Name: Gauss Rifle MK2 (Experiential)
Item.Description: Newly created Gauss Rifle MK2. Occupy Net Sphere with upgraded Gauss Rifle MK2.

Item.Name: Gauss Rifle MK2 (Event)
Item.Description: Newly created Gauss Rifle MK2. Occupy Net Sphere with upgraded Gauss Rifle MK2.

Item.Name: Rolling Vulcan
Item.Description: A unique and powerful Heavy Machine Gun!{N}Three barrels fire consecutively while rotating! It has a high magazine capacity and a wide attack range, but requires extra time to warm up.

Item.Name: Slayer
Item.Description: Whatever area attacked by the Slayer will be effortlessly erased from the map. There's no escaping the hail of bullets when an enemy enters the range of the Slayer.

Item.Name: Rail Gun
Item.Description: Sniping weapon which attacks with high density gravity energy. You have to gather energy for stronger attacks. But your movement speed is decreased while you gather the energy.

Item.Name: Cannonade
Item.Description: Weapon that condenses and launches strong energy from a spinning rail inside the weapon. The energy explodes at the target and damages opponents nearby.

Item.Name: Signal Railgun
Item.Description: Low-cost, high-efficiency Rail gun tuned to focus on concentrating energy. It has more accurate and stronger attack power.

Item.Name: Dragonade
Item.Description: Experience the taste of ade which is fired from Dragonade.

Item.Name: Sharpshooter
Item.Description: Bolt Action Gun weapon that is able to target the enemy from the long distance. Because of its accuracy, there will be a small movement during the zoom in mode.

Item.Name: Mad Bunny Railgun
Item.Description: Unique Mad bunny Railgun stronger than ever!

Item.Name: Antique Sharp Shooter
Item.Description: A gun that has been tuned by Darten, the Hunter. Because of its high sensibility, there will be a small movement during the zoom in mode.

Item.Name: Pretender
Item.Description: Martin's Unique Rail Gun{N}A rail gun hidden in the guise of a simple stick.{N}Its name, Pretender, refers to its subtle, disguised appearance.

Item.Name: Jaws Water Gun
Item.Description: It's a toy water-gun that shoots water whith striking precision.{N} Users under 18 years of age must be accompanied by an experienced trainer when using this item.

Item.Name: Sentry Gun
Item.Description: Installation weapon that finds and attacks an enemy. It only attacks enemies in front of it, and doesn't change to the opponents direction.

Item.Name: Sentiforce
Item.Description: Installation weapon which stuns and decreases HP{N}to nearby enemies. Unlike the sentry gun, this weapon also affects all enemies within the 360 degree radius.

Item.Name: Senty Nell
Item.Description: Installation weapon which stuns and decreases HP to nearby enemies. Unlike the sentry gun, this weapon also affects all enemies within the 360 degree radius.

Item.Name: Honey Bee Sentry Gun
Item.Description: If you look down on it, you might have to pay dearly later on. The sting of the Honey Bee is very painful!

Item.Name: Fumbi Senty Nell
Item.Description: Now Fumbi supports you on the battle ground. Let's rock with Fumbi!

Item.Name: Mine Gun
Item.Description: Weapon with compressed explosive energy in ball form for carefully timed sniping. It is made to explode on physical contact. Research into the flight of the ball is essential.

Item.Name: Earth Bomber
Item.Description: Big energy implosion for a huge blast. Attention: The blast can damage allies nearby!

Item.Name: Lightning Bomber
Item.Description: Fires a special bullet out of concentrated energy and hits with a huge lightning explosion. It damages all players nearby the detonation, even allies!

Item.Name: Rescue Gun
Item.Description: Throwing weapon for healing multiple players. But, you can't heal yourself.

Item.Name: DJ Rescue Gun
Item.Description: Unique Rescue Gun. Music is the best healing therapy. Let’s DJing!

Item.Name: Skull Earth Bomber
Item.Description: Skull Patterned Earth Bomber

Item.Name: Lightning Bomber MK2
Item.Description: A newly created bomber that prevents an enemy's movement with strong lightning power. It explodes faster than the previous model, and now it is more effective in limiting enemies' damage and movement.

Item.Name: MK2 Rescue Gun
Item.Description: The MK2 Rescue Gun grants stronger healing abilities. A new weapon that allows you to heal and reload simultaneously! Help your allies with the MK2 Rescue Gun!

Item.Name: Summer Night Mine Gun
Item.Description: An unique version of the mine gun!{N}Shake off the heat with star balloons on a summer night!

Item.Name: Kaboom!
Item.Description: A toy made by Dead Pixel modelled after Fumbi.{N}Despite it's toy-like appearance, it detonates very loudly. Handle with caution.

Item.Name: Critical Error
Item.Description: Destruction Glitch's Unique Lightning Bomber.{N}Object: This small packet of error codes can even be generated by a stationary Destruction Glitch.{N}A dark fissure tears through space, inflicting internal code disintegration upon those in its path.

Item.Name: Watermelon Bomber
Item.Description: A bomb shaped liked a watermelon.{N} Don't be fooled by its delicious disguise— this melon's not for eating!

Item.Name: Snow Earth Bomber (Event)
Item.Description: The Earth Bomber wipes out enemies with a rough snow storm.

Item.Name: Snow Earth Bomber
Item.Description: The Earth Bomber wipes out enemies with a rough snow storm.

Item.Name: Mind Energy
Item.Description: Mental weapon that can recover your teams health. It can penetrate through walls or obstacles.

Item.Name: Mind Shock
Item.Description: Mental weapon that absorbs enemy health by disturbing the mind of the enemy. It causes huge shock damage by penetrating walls or obstacles.

Item.Name: Heart Of Princess
Item.Description: You can feel the mysterious aurora and the warm love from the princess from far far away.

Item.Name: Alice Shock
Item.Description: The Mind Shock which was infected by Alice Baby. It takes away the HP from opponent players and recovers the own HP.

Item.Name: Magic Cube
Item.Description: A cube that is used by the magicians to heal league players. It's very powerful.

Item.Name: Power of Solo
Item.Description: The Envy Ranger version of the Mind Shock.{N}Feel the power of envy!

Item.Name: Half HP Mastery
Item.Description: A passive skill that will be effective simply by wearing it, you don't need to activate it. This will increase your survival time by increasing your physical strength.

Item.Name: HP Mastery
Item.Description: A passive skill that will be effective simply by wearing it, you don't need to activate it. This will increase your survival time by increasing your physical strength.

Item.Name: Skill Mastery
Item.Description: A passive skill that will be effective simply by wearing it, you don't need to activate it. Max SP is increased so that your skills will occur more often and last longer.

Item.Name: Dual Mastery
Item.Description: It's one of passive skills and if you equip it, the item effects are activated. Both HP+20 and SP+20 are increased, so you can easily react against various situations.

Item.Name: Metallic
Item.Description: Defensive skill bounces off bullets by changing the character’s body to hard steel. The character cannot move while he uses the skill. On Metallic status, a character gets his HP gradually and defensive power increases as well. At the same time, it gives the damage back to the attacker.

Item.Name: HP/SP Dual mastery (Returner)
Item.Description: It's one of passive skills and if you equip it, the item effects are activated. Both HP+20 and SP+20 are increased, so you can easily react against various situations.

Item.Name: Unique Dual Mastery
Item.Description: Both HP and SP increase +5 compared to the previous Dual-Mastery due to the upgrade of the Enhancement and SP Support Systems.

Item.Name: Anchoring
Item.Description: A skill that allows you to move quickly by launching a grappling chain at the wall or background. Cannot be used for long distance.

Item.Name: surfingboard anchoring
Item.Description: Give the energy of the hot summer clean up the cool water sports! Anchoring unique type!{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}SP Reduced consumption(-5%),Use distance Increase(+5%)

Item.Name: Dolphin Anchor
Item.Description: Be like a dolphin jumping on the surface of the ocean!{N}Could life get any better?!{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}Reduces SP consumption (-5%), Increases range (+5%)

Item.Name: Flying
Item.Description: A skill that ignores the laws of physics and moves you into the air. When using this skill you will easily conquer high areas by rising quickly. However movement speed in the air is slow.

Item.Name: Wings of Death
Item.Description: Newly enhanced Demon wings! Feel the speed of demon wings and get better position before your enemy. {N}{CB-255,255,0,255}(SP usage -5%, MoveSpeed +10%)

Item.Name: Death Wing (Returner)
Item.Description: Newly enhanced Demon wings! Feel the speed of demon wings and get better position before your enemy. {N}{CB-255,255,0,255}(SP usage -5%, MoveSpeed +10%)

Item.Name: Virtual Wing
Item.Description: Net Shaman Luna's exclusive Virtual Wing.{N}This unique equipment was developed during Luna's test phase.{N}Fashioned after a set of eagle's wings, it was designed to fold for easy storage.

Item.Name: Invisible
Item.Description: A skill that allows you to hide your appearance. If you stand still you are totally invisible, but if you move you will be detected because objects around you are reflected. If you attack while you are invisible, your original appearance is revealed.

Item.Name: Detect
Item.Description: A skill that allows you to sense an enemy's location in a certain range and send it to team players. You are able to sense an opponent using the Invisible skill.

Item.Name: Shield
Item.Description: This skill creates a wall in front of you. You can defend using this by blocking a route or making a cover.

Item.Name: Powers' Shield
Item.Description: Powers' Shield effectively and reliably absorbs enemy bullets, rendering them harmless.Deploys a shield in the front of {N}. Can be used to deflect enemy projectiles and deal damage. Allies behind the shield can provide suppressing fire, which will pass through the shield. However, the shield will disengage upon use of a Melee attack.{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}Powers' Shield (Duration increases, SP Consumption decreases when attacked)

Item.Name: Block
Item.Description: This skill creates a wall in front of you. You can defend using this by blocking a route or making a cover.

Item.Name: Toy Block
Item.Description: Looks like a Toy block but it has enhanced power than it looks.{N}Set the block wall in front of yourself. Use it wisely.

Item.Name: Ice Block
Item.Description: Block that is upgraded by The World. Increase the solidity of the Block by using ice crystals. Ice Block {N}{CB-255,255,0,255}(SP Usage (-16%), HP (+7%)

Item.Name: Bind
Item.Description: Tie up the enemy with chains. Bound players cannot move for 3 seconds but can attack and use skills.

Item.Name: Vienna Sausage Bind
Item.Description: Very delicious sausage! Tie up the enemy with chains. Bounded players cannot move for 3 seconds but able to use skills and attack.{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}SP Reduced consumption(-20%)),Use distance Increase(+20%)

Item.Name: Malware Bind
Item.Description: Code: one of Glitch's techniques that destroys the opponent's avatar rights and forcefully takes control.{N}It was once a technique that could control an opponent's movement, but after the Leaguers fought back, is was only sufficient for obstructing movement.{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}SP Reduced consumption(-20%),Use distance Increase(+20%)

Item.Name: Metallic
Item.Description: Defensive skill bounces off bullets by changing the character’s body to hard steel. The character cannot move while he uses the skill. On Metallic status, a character gets his HP gradually and defensive power increases as well. At the same time, it gives the damage back to the attacker.

Item.Name: Golden Metallic
Item.Description: Defensive skill bounces off bullets by changing the character’s body to hard steel. The character cannot move while he uses the skill. On Metallic status, a character gets his HP gradually and defensive power increases as well. At the same time, it gives the damage back to the attacker. {N}{CB-255,255,0,255}(SP usage -5%, Defense +5%)

Item.Name: Metallic Fumbi
Item.Description: This Metallic Fumbi will transform you into a beautifully groomed Fumbi.{N}{CB-255,255,0,255}(SP usage -5%, Defense +5%)

Item.Name: Change Nickname
Item.Description: This will change your nickname permanently.

Item.Name: Remove the nickname change
Item.Description: Remove the nickname change effect and change your current nickname to previous one. Even if you delete the item by "drop" function, the nickname change effect still remains.

Item.Name: 1Day Change Nickname
Item.Description: Changed nickname is available for a day.

Item.Name: 7Days Change Nickname
Item.Description: Changed nickname is available for 7 days.

Item.Name: 30Days Change Nickname
Item.Description: Changed nickname is available for 30 days.

Item.Name: 3Days Change Nickname
Item.Description: Changed nickname is available for 3 days.

Item.Name: Reset the Death Match History
Item.Description: Reset Item (Death Match)

Item.Name: FUMBI Capsule 1
Item.Description: This is a lottery item, you can get at maximum 300.000 PEN

Item.Name: FUMBI Capsule 2
Item.Description: This is a lottery item, you can get at maximum 1.000.000 PEN

Item.Name: FUMBI Capsule 1
Item.Description: This is a lottery item, you can get at maximum 300.000 PEN

Item.Name: FUMBI Capsule 2
Item.Description: This is a lottery item, you can get at maximum 1.000.000 PEN

Item.Name: not trans
Item.Description: not trans

Item.Name: not trans
Item.Description: not trans

Item.Name: PEN Capsule 500
Item.Description: You may have at most 300,000 PEN and some items randomly.

Item.Name: PEN Capsule 900
Item.Description: You get up to 1.000.000 PEN and some items randomly.{N}{CB-0,255,0,255}Moreover, you will get 1 Card randomly as well.

Item.Name: PEN Capsule 1500
Item.Description: You get up to 1.500.000 PEN and some items randomly.{N}{CB-0,255,0,255}Moreover, you will get 1 Card randomly as well.

Item.Name: Mini Pen Capsule
Item.Description: You have a chance to win up to 300.000 PEN from this capsule.

Item.Name: [Event] Random Map Reward Capsule
Item.Description: Event for New Random Map! Random Map Reward Capsule.

Item.Name: [Event] Random Mode Reward Capsule
Item.Description: Event for New Random Mode! Random Mode Reward Capsule.

Item.Name: [Event] Capsule for New Map Winner
Item.Description: Event for new map, 'Ice Square'! Reward for Ice Square Winner

Item.Name: [Event] Capsule for New Map Loser
Item.Description: Event for new map, 'Ice Square'! Reward for Ice Square Loser

Item.Name: [EVENT] Item Crafting Experiential Kit
